turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. For some reason, our last session disconnected. But originally, I was placing an order for an iced cafe mocha from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry to hear. yes, let me get on that right away. which starbucks should i order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The That would be all. I would like you to repeat those details back to me once you have them confirmed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for your 1 tall iced cafe mocha with 2% milk and no whipped cream from the starbucks in temple texas will come out to $4.50

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed your order. it'll be ready for pick up in 15 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you. Have a good day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. take care. thanks, you too.
